sentences.en: Element of sweetness of the abuse in children food and saccharin natrium phenomenon are serious.
sentences.cn: 儿童食品中滥用甜蜜素和糖精钠现象严重.

sentences.en: Fish liver oil, glycerin, soybean oil, saccharin.
sentences.cn: 鱼肝油, 甘油, 黄豆油, 糖精,纯化水.

sentences.en: I provided a lot of sodium ( Saccharin Sodium ) , if necessary, please contact me!
sentences.cn: 我公司提供大量的糖精钠 ( SaccharinSodium ), 如有需要请与我联系!

sentences.en: In particular, sensitivity to PTC and certain con - centrations of saccharin may have a genetic basis.
sentences.cn: 特别是对PTC和特定浓度的糖精的敏感性有一种遗传学的基础.

sentences.en: Is saccharin a good substitute for sugar?
sentences.cn: 糖精是糖的良好替代品 吗 ?

sentences.en: Most artificial sweeteners - saccharin aspartame and sucralose, for example - offer the sweetness of sugar without the calories.
sentences.cn: 大多数人工甜味剂,比如糖精、 阿斯巴特 和三氯蔗糖, 都能产生普通糖一样的甜味,但不会产生热量.
糖精是一种人工增甜剂. ￡10

sentences.en: The efforts on closedown and suspension of small sugar refineries, small saccharin refineries and small paper mills are also being carried out in steps.
sentences.cn: 关停小糖厂 、 小糖精厂、小造纸厂的工作也已逐步展开.

sentences.en: The new method of determining saccharin sodium in beverages by sodium salicylate colorimetry is studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了水杨酸钠比色法测定饮料中糖精钠的新方法.

sentences.en: The saccharin-fed animals, on the other hand, showed no such rise in temperature.
sentences.cn: 另一方面，食用糖精的小白鼠并没有出现体温升高的现象。

sentences.en: The use of saccharin is strongly discouraged during pregnancy because it can cross the placenta and may remain in fetal tissues.
sentences.cn: 怀孕期间要强烈阻止糖精的食用，因为它可以穿过胎盘并可以积聚在胎儿的体内。

sentences.en: Though not fully researched and proven, your metabolic rates could be being altered by diet foods, including the low-calorie sweetener saccharin, which increases the chance of weight gain.
sentences.cn: 尽管这还没有确切的研究证明，但是你的新陈代谢速度可能被减肥食物所改变，包括低热量的甜味剂糖精，它增大了你获得体重的机率。

sentences.en: We use saccharin in substitution for sugar.

words.tran_cn: 含糖的；极甜的；和颜悦色的
[有化]糖精；邻磺酰苯甲酰亚胺

trans.tran_en: a chemical substance that tastes sweet and is used instead of sugar in drinks
